actionCalls.description: Calls an action that invokes the Apply Asset Service Lifecycle Management Pricing API to apply coverage discounts.
actionCalls.name: ApplAssetSvcLifecycleManagementPricing
actionCalls.label: Apply Asset Service Lifecycle Management Pricing

assignments.description: Sets the PricingStatus variable to Completed.
assignments.name: SetPricingStatusVariableCompleted
assignments.label: Set Pricing Status Variable

assignments.description: Sets the PricingStatus variable to Failed.
assignments.name: SetPricingStatusVariableFailed
assignments.label: Set Pricing Status Variable

constants.description: Stores the key prefix of work order records.
constants.name: WorkOrderKeyPrefix

decisions.description: Determines whether the pricing API should be executed by checking if the AddWorkSourcesWorkTypesCoveragesPricingOrchestrator output has pricing data.
decisions.name: HavePricingData
decisions.label: Have Pricing Data?

decisions.description: Determines whether recordId is for a work order by checking if the SourceContext formula matches the WorkOrderKeyPrefix value.
decisions.name: IsRecordIdForAWorkOrder
decisions.label: Is Record ID for a Work Order?

Flow.description: Release 254: Changes corresponding to WOE in release 254

formulas.description: Extracts the first 3 characters from the recordId variable.
formulas.name: SourceContext

Flow.label: Custom Work Order Estimation

screens.description: Screen to enter the quote details
screens.name: Enter_Quote_Details
screens.label: Enter Quote Details

screens.description: Allows the flow user to add work sources, work types, and coverages.
screens.name: ScreenAddWorkSourceWorkTypesCoverages
screens.label: Add Work Source, Work Types, & Coverages

screens.description: Displays a list of existing work orders.
screens.name: ScreenDisplayExistingWorkOrder
screens.label: Display Existing Work Order

screens.description: Allows the flow user to finish the quote approval steps.
screens.name: ScreenFinishQuoteApproval
screens.label: Finish Quote Approval

screens.description: Allows the flow user to review the quote summary.
screens.name: ScreenReviewQuoteSummary
screens.label: Review Quote Summary

variables.description: Stores the ID of the current quote for which the user is entering details.
variables.name: QuoteId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the record passed into the flow.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores the selected coverages from the ScreenAddWorkSourceWorkTypesCoverages element.
variables.name: SelectedCoverages
